name: Plant Plants
description:
A few words

Hi there, here is a game prototype to get the ball rolling and releasing game projects made in ~48h. 

There is not much but I hope you'll enjoy it :) Feel free to post comments of what you've liked or disliked.

Once upon a seed...

They grow so fast... enjoy and relax while watching plants rooting and growing into your propitious piece of lands.

From one finger, make that vegetal life appear by choosing what they prefer. A desert, grass or soil maybe ? Be surprised and collect all the mysterious plants. Each plants have their preferences so try and experiment and with a bit of luck get the most rare and valuable specimens. 

Quick Start

  1. Collect carbons to build fertile lands and get more plants
  2. Attract certain type of plants by adding decoration 
  3. When they'll be fully grown, you can collect and start again!
